attributes.action: Stop MP's fiddling the system,buying homes,at the tax payers expense.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This Concerns all Mp's.This is to stop this rediculouse government rule on exspenses.We the Tax call on a revue of the whole civil service.We all know the civil service is rife with a large over flowing cash pot,for all,yet nothing is done.WHY.This is not just a direct government problem.It is the whole civil service.
